Cattle: § 558.78Bacitracin zinc.(a) Specifications. Type A medicated articles containing bacitracin zinc equivalent to 10, 25, 40, or 50 grams per pound bacitracin.(b) Approvals. See No. 054771 in § 510.600(c) of this chapter.(c) Related tolerances. See § 556.70 of this chapter.(d) Conditions of use.
Amount (g/ton): (2) It is used in feed for growing cattle at 35 to 70 milligrams per head per day as follows:(i) To aid in stimulating growth and improving feed efficiency.(ii) For increased rate of weight gain and improved feed efficiency; see sponsor 054771.
